nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM HONE STEADILY MOVING WESTWARD TOWARD HAWAII... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND...
summary:
...TROPICAL STORM HONE STEADILY MOVING WESTWARD TOWARD HAWAII... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND...
 As of 2:00 PM HST Sat Aug 24
 the center of Hone was located near 17.9, -153.7
 with movement W at 15 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.
